item.title: Algomorphogenesis
item.description: Algomorphogenesis John Rhey Damian View Repository Description This website is a static site generated with Hugo to serve as my journal, as well as my web portfolio. Initially, this project started as a compilation of javascript files as I learn more about creative coding and web development. Then, the web portfolio combined with this project since I’ll have to show my progress as a developer.
